value:
$WmMPID_ラインハルト,ch07_01_Reinhardt_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Olwen, retreat. I intend to keep
you safe, Sister.$k$pOur opponents here are quite
skilled—as worthy of being called
Heroes as any I've ever met.$k$pShould the worst occur, I may
not be able to protect you.$k$p$WmMPID_オルエン,ch07_00_Olwen_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I refuse, Brother. I will stay right
here where I can be of use.$k$pAll I've ever wanted is to fight
at your side. So command me
all you like, Reinhardt.$k$pI will still obey my heart.$k$p$WmMPID_ラインハルト,ch07_01_Reinhardt_M_Normal,Face|$w0|My, my—you've grown into quite
the formidable woman.$k$pYou've chosen to go your own
path at last. And still for now, you
choose to ride alongside mine.$k$pVery well. Into battle.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ラインハルト,ch07_01_Reinhardt_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Our paths end here, Sister.
But did you witness it?$k$pTheir strength...their strategy...
Magnificent!$k$p$WmMPID_オルエン,ch07_00_Olwen_F_Normal,Face|$w0|They were adversaries that I will
not soon forget. Wonderful,
every one of them.$k$pBest of all, their victory should
free us from the contract that
binds us here.$k$pPerhaps we will meet again in
some other world, where they
will want us at their side.$k$p$WmMPID_ラインハルト,ch07_01_Reinhardt_M_Normal,Face|$w0|If that is our fate, I would wish for
only one thing, Sister. That you
and I should not be parted.$k$Sbs150|
